statements: DELETE FROM solar_panel_efficiency_ratings WHERE manufacturer = 'SolarTech' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SolarPanels WHERE id = 100 AND panel_name = 'Panel A';
DELETE FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 200 AND (latitude > 40.000000 OR longitude < -100.000000);
DELETE FROM panel_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'panel cleaning';
DELETE FROM panel_installations WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM WarrantyDetails WHERE panel_id = 2005 AND warranty_provider = 'SolarCo';
DELETE FROM panel_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
